title: [1.7.3]树灵TREE SPIRIT【更新至 V5】
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huhu呼呼 于 2011-9-3 13:39 编辑 
Have you ever want a strong, tiny warrior that will protect you from the evil mobs when you're mining?
你有没有希望有强大而又微小的战士，以在挖矿遇怪是保护你？
Have you ever want epic faction fights?
你有没有希望有更难的派系战斗？
Have you ever want epic boss fights?
你有没有想有更难的对战boss吗？
Have you ever want to be hardcore >:3

Well, i present to you "The Tree Spirit" mod


[white_wool][lightgrey_wool][grey_wool][black_wool]以下是搬运的视频[lime_wool][yellow_wool][red_wool][magenta_wool][orange_wool][lightblue_wool][green_wool][pink_wool][blue_wool][brown_wool]http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMzAwODY1ODIw.html
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMzAwODc4OTM2.html
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMzAwODgzMTc2.html
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMzAwODg2NDUy.html

[minecart_track1][detector_rail1][powered_rail1]下载与安装视频[powered_rail1]（额，咋是v4.1，但v5不是用蓝火，可以正常下载无需翻墙）[powered_rail1][detector_rail1][minecart_track1]

http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMzAwODg5MDA4.html

[powered_minecart]Download下载

Version 5: http://adf.ly/2WgAs

Link to his topic

[minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][minecart_track1][rail_corner3]



v4.1的http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-7895-1-1.html




视频以介绍很清楚，碰此树会扣血，普通斧头对此无效，打此树树叶会掉，需要工具Holy Axe.



而打下的木头可以合成Holy Sword



还有Holy Seed，合成方法：



使用Holy Seed，可以得到树灵 Tree Spirit.

（为被驯服的树灵）


（已被驯服的树灵（要种子驯服））





神圣的种子


黑暗的种子




召唤boss



Ver 5: Added carrying normal TS with a saddle, added new Boss: Mage, added 2 new classes, added 2 new weapons, added another dispenser, tweaks, added Tree Spirit's house, added new feature: give slimeball to TS to negate fall damage
